# Global Health Observatory

The WHO global database for health  and  health-related  indicators, presenting  the latest available data at  global, regional  and national  levels. This database is the  WHO gateway to  health-related  statistics,  providing access to over 1000 indicators on  priority health topics including mortality  and burden of diseases (75).
